name: Sky Runner (itch) (thewakiaki)
description:
This was the first 3D game that I have made and was a project for my first year at Uni. The game is made using OpenGL and the assets were self made using Blender.

The aim of the game is simple, survive for as long as you can by avoiding the incoming objects. The longer the you survive the higher your score will become, the score is constantly displayed in the top left corner of the window.

Controls

  • Use the WASD keys to move the ship around
  • Right click on the screen to change difficulty or quit the game
  • The game can also be exited via the cross button on the top right of the window

Hope you enjoy the game and if not please leave a comment as to what could be improved.
